Articles.Content: The engines in this mod is superb. My only problem is using them at later stages. Decouplers don't connect properly to the bottom and don't loosen from the engine. The decouplers do attach at the bottom node of the decoupler and so don't detach during staging. Anybody know how to fix this in the .cfg files of the parts?

You need to flip the node_stack_bottom nodes for each of the engines. Go into each of the engines .cfg files and change the AngY to -1.0

Example: node_stack_bottom = 0.0, -7.27403, 0.0, 0.0, -1.0, 0.0
Oh thanks a lot, you literary saved all life in the multiverse.
